item.title: System76 Starling Netbook
item.description: Linux system builder System76 upgraded their Starling netbook quietly in Q2 2011 with a 1.66 GHz dual-core Intel Atom N570 processor.

item.title: System76 Starling Netbook v2
item.description: Linux system builder System76 created a successor to their 1st generation Starling netbook.

item.title: System76 Starling EduBook
item.description: A year after launching the 1st version of the Starling Netbook, Linux system builder System76 comes up with a new small laptop targeted at students.

item.title: System76 Starling Netbook v1
item.description: System76 is a company based in Denver, Colorado that provides and supports Ubuntu pre-installed laptops, desktops, and servers.
